mapper.insert: insert into hall(hall_id, hall_name, zip_code, address1, address2, hall_description, warning, create_date, area, width, length, height, maximum, user_id) values(#{hall_id}, #{hall_name}, #{zip_code}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{hall_description}, #{warning}, #{create_date}, #{area}, #{width}, #{length}, #{height}, #{maximum}, #{user_id})
insert into hall_time(type, price, hall_id) values(#{type}, #{price}, #{hall_id})
insert into equipment(hall_id, equip_type, equip_name, equip_num, equip_price) values(#{hall_id}, #{equip_type}, #{equip_name}, #{equip_num}, #{equip_price})
mapper.select: select hall_id from hall order by hall_id desc limit 1
mapper.update: UPDATE hall SET hall_name = #{hall_name}, zip_code = #{zip_code}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, hall_description = #{hall_description}, warning = #{warning}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, hall_description = #{hall_description}, warning = #{warning}, create_date = #{create_date}, area = #{area}, width = #{width}, length = #{length}, height = #{height}, maximum = #{maximum} WHERE hall_id = #{hall_id}
mapper.select: select * from hall order by #{sort} desc
select hall_time (select * from hall_time where type=#{type} limit 1) as success
